transcript: And then last year when we came to see it, you ran out of the house so fast that you stubbed your toe and you didn't even notice until you got in the car.

segments.text: And then last year when we came to see it, you ran out of the house so fast that you stubbed
your toe and you didn't even notice until you got in the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And then last year when we came to see it you ran out of the house so fast that you stubbed your toe. And you didn't even notice until you got in the car.
